REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0987 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 03-03 0067

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN 24 MLN STG ASSISTANCE
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it provided 24 mln stg help to the money market in the morning session. This compares with the bank's upward revised shortage forecast of around 500 mln stg. The central bank purchased bank bills outright comprising two mln stg in band one at 10-7/8 pct and 22 mln stg in band two at 10-13/16 pct. REUTER
